name: Posterfriend
tag_list: posters, poster-generation, uk-eu, social-media, facebook, instagram
overview:
PosterFriend turns online digital social media pictures into a range of posters.

PosterFriend allows users to quickly select images and design their own personalized poster with message for their own wall or as a present.

PosterFriend provides the user to select their digital pictures quickly using a host of clever software tools of tagged people and simply design beautiful personal posters of their life, pulling together their poster in minutes of up to 98 pictures, including named people into a beautifully designed poster.

PosterFriend delivers within a few days a high quality poster, with pins and Blu tack, so users only need to put it on their wall.

Posterfriend is ideal for students, teenagers and other young independent customer groups looking to share and relive their life experiences.
